name: Poke. Stroke. Grasp.
description:
Poke. Stroke. Grasp. is a short experience on gender dysphoria.

The Game is best played with a controller, but can also be played with keyboard. A video is also available to watch a full play through of the game if you prefer to experience without playing.

Directions are provided in game.

Note: The Mac & Linux builds are untested and therefore may have some issue. If there are any issues with these builds please let me know.

Known issues with these builds, fix incoming.
